changes.change: Fixed settings menu not being accessible on Series 3 and below
Removed Tip Jar in-app purchases
Some complications now indicate if sentry mode is active
Updated UI in vehicle chooser
Added estimated time of completion when charging - tap the time remaining label to toggle
Added section to show if any vehicle features are open
Added indicator to some complications if any vehicle features are open
Added defrost toggle control

Show Unlock Port in force touch context menu. This will stop charging if charging and unlock the charge port, if a cable is connected. This will be available even if the car is already unlocked. Should make it easy to always be able to disconnect charge cable, no matter what state the car is in. Just force touch, tap unlock port and port should unlock and allow cable to be disconnected.
Added background image support.
Close windows when tapping open features alert panel
Tap big battery to switch to small battery and range panel instead
Show if sentry is active in new small battery panel
Link to FAQ in login screen and settings screen
Added Handover of FAQ url - when on the login or settings page nearby devices will allow opening the FAQ url from Handoff
Removed app logo stencil and added actual Settings button instead. Not too many people got the Tesla logo easter-egg reference
Added a credits section to the about screen
Will only update in background if complication is active
Fixed settings menu not being accessible on Series 3 and below
New feature - plug-in reminder. Toggle on in settings and add vehicles current location for each location you wish to get notified if vehicle is not plugged in, when at given location.
Added Twitter account to login and about screens for easier access to support
Made the settings button a proper normal button
Added Twitter handle for app to login and about screens
Updated some classic complications to show charge state, sentry and open features warning
Validate background image url - should prevent crash on bad url
Will no longer schedule background updates if vehicle is below 20%
Some complication gauges and the battery icons will now show yellow or red colors if battery is below 20% or 10%
In vehicle chooser, model, model year and AWD is now decoded from VIN. No decode of Ludicrous/Performance or other special models yet!
Updated localizations
Added proper charging view when Supercharging. Tesla unfortunately hides actual amperage and voltage, so actual power and “range per hour” is shown instead - as in the car.
Added French localization
Will now show SC when supercharger is connected, instead of wrongly showing 1x16 A.
*New features*

Streaming support - when car is in N, R or D the app will try to enable streaming allowing for quick-updating driving state panel. Tap this panel to enter full-screen for a no-distractions view while driving.
Added seat heaters control
Added allow wake between feature - only allow car to be woken up in certain hours - for instance to allow it to deep sleep during the night

Added option to enable local notification if any vehicle features are open - this will only be triggered from background updates, so if those are off or vehicle cannot be woken up, these will not trigger
Dismiss open features reminder for the rest of the day (if you leave the windows open on purpose, for instance)
Added Sunroof control to vehicles with support for that
Added push notifications when command completes in the background
*Enhancements*
Updated circular graphic complication to show range or soc plus one state icon - open features, charging, sentry, sleeping or range/soc unit in that order whichever comes first
Background update every 15 minutes while driving and every 5 minutes while supercharging
Now showing release notes since last build on first run
In detailed header mode, show Dog mode or Camp mode when active
Added charge time and charge limit when in detailed header mode and charging
Added black background to big battery to make range label more readable at lower charge states
Added software update availability, download and install status to vehicle chooser
Added lock-state to open features warning - tap warning panel to quickly close and lock
Added Sunroof to open features checks and warnings - can close with tap on warning
Added sleeping indicator to some complications
Some complications will now show range if sentry is not active and SoC is set to percent in vehicle
Added debug output to Settings screen
*Bugfixes*
Hide window controls for Model S vehicles
Removed logout after re-install in preparation for new features
Adjusted vehicle name size in vehicle chooser
Added initial view when no data is present
Now showing vehicle model when no custom name is set
Only show keyless drive settings and button if enabled in vehicle
When charging is only scheduled to start and not departure, only start will be shown
Fixed background updates waking up when not allowed
Adjusted layouts to be more scaleable to varying string lengths
Fix for location button not visible
Only show charger-phases if known
Removed support for custom background images
Support standard and nominal range as configured in vehicle (model s and x)
*New features*
PLEASE NOTE: Controls on watchOS 7 have now moved to separate tab. Swipe left and right to access and dismiss.
Added rudimentary Siri support. Get lock status. Set lock status. Get battery status. Signal visual and audio.
Added Compass feature from Dude! Where's my Tesla? app - will indicate direction and distance to parked vehicle
*Enhancements*
Added auto-enable remote start on unlock option in settings
Added ability to show two rows of main control buttons
Added ability to manually sort control buttons and choose which controls show as main control buttons
Added Portuguese localization support.
Added Russian localization support.
Updated login screen error messages to help debugging login issues
Added toggle to show inactive controls to preserve sort ordering
Message about having to enable climate before activating seat heaters
*Bugfixes*
Only send plugin reminders and open features reminders when vehicle is in Park
Several minor watchOS 7 compatibility fixes
*New features*

Added an iOS counterpart app. Please install this to your phone and login with the new Multi Factor Authorization flow. Logging in with MFA should also solve the sporadic logout issue some people were experiencing

Added watchOS 7 action complications. Following actions can now be added directly to watch face: Unlock, open frunk, toggle climate, open trunk, toggle sentry, remote start, activate Homelink, start defrost and unlock charge port
Added Korean localizations, thanks to 김동영
Added Italian localizations, thanks to Rocco S.
Added estimated range optional label - show by tapping range label when in small battery mode
*Enhancements*
Show percent battery when range unit is set to distance for large rectangular complication
Show loading message when loading release notes
Clear plugin reminder and open features reminder notifications when these states are no longer registered
Added message to login screen, warning about possible account lockout if unable to authenticate
Updated icononography
Updated graphic complication corner image assets
Vehicle chooser now caching data - should open up much faster now
*Bugfixes*
Fixed Siri lock / unlock actions did the opposite as requested
Fixed Siri opening the chargeport on unlock and not activating remote start when set to auto activate
Minor metadata changes
*New features*
Widgets! On iOS and iPadOS 14 you can now add status and controls widgets.
Added iPad support
Added setting to disable confirmation of complication or widget actions. Non-reversible actions always require confirmation.
Added background widget update support for iOS
iOS, iPadOS and Widgets can now toggle between light mode, dark mode and auto theme
*Enhancements*
UI adjustedments - colors, backgrounds, gradients, padding, sizing of things
Size of controls on controls page are now reduced on iOS
Re-instated controls ordering and remote start for iOS app
Removed tab-view on iOS. Access controls by button below main controls
Re-introduced allow wake between to iOS
Fixed proper labels when triggering widget actions and using same labels when reordering controls
*Bugfixes*
Improved token handling - more retries, less fatal logouts
Added network connectivity detection - app will show if not properly connected to Tesla servers
Fixed driving mode view on iOS
*Bugfixes*
Fixed crash when tapping controls on watchOS 6 and iOS 13
Fixed Open trunk and Open frunk labels accidentally being swapped
*Enhancements*
Adjusted data displayed in medium and large status widgets
Added Chinese localization thanks to Jackie Lau
*Bugfixes*
Updated token handling - now using v2 / v3 hybrid - should reduce network requests by 50%
Set max size for controls - should behave better on iPad now
Switch to showing usable battery level - should account for minor discrepancy between official app and this app, as well as cold weather
Fixed bug where remote start password would sporadically be cleared
Added max height on battery header - should behave better on iPad now
*Enhancements*
Updated Czech localizations
Updated Dutch localizations
*Bugfixes*
Improved login handling - should help converting login from watch-only
*New features*

IMPORTANT PLEASE NOTE: Removed username / password login from watchOS app as Tesla has now deprecated legacy login. The iOS companion app is now REQUIRED for login using the modern web based method. If you had previously logged in directly on the watch itself, please find the Watch for Tesla app in the App Store on your phone and install it, and use that to login. Your login will then be transferred to the watch. This is NOT a separate purchase - it is the same app and same purchase as on the watch. I'm really sorry for the inconvenience. Thanks.
Added support for activating heated steering wheel along with heated seats.
*Enhancements*
Updated Chinese localizations.
Updated Swiss German localizations.
Updated Czech localizations.
When data is older than one hour, interface and widgets are now dimmed.
Added snowflake icon when battery is cold and below capacity.
Added ability for user to manually email debug logs to developer. Nothing will EVER be sent automatically!
Updated the login form UI.
Now shows close frunk when open - only useful for those with power frunks.
*Bugfixes*
Fix for plugin and open features reminder not triggering if watch complication not in use.
Fixes an issue where views presented in navigation would self-dismiss.
Improved token handling when refreshing expired tokens.
Improved logging when requests fail.
Will now try to force refresh token whenever an access denied response is encountered.
Fixed complication actions - unlock now performs all unlock actions.
Login from China now using local login form.
*New features*

Initial batch of Siri Shortcuts actions added: Close Charge Port, Close Frunk,  Close Trunk,  Disable Sentry,  Enable Sentry,  Lock,  Open Charge Port,  Open Frunk,  Open Trunk,  Start Charging,  Start Climate,  Start Defrost,  Stop Charging,  Stop Climate,  Stop Defrost,  Unlock.
Added new Shortcuts section under Settings - get in contact if you want your Shortcuts featured here!
*Enhancements*
Added referral link to Settings screen - sorry about the shameless plug, but it will help support the app!
Adjusted stale data dimming window down from one hour to 15 minutes.
*New features*
Added Start/stop charging complication.
Added Set charge limit, Vent and Close windows, Trigger Homelink, Unlock Charge Port, Wake and Get Vehicle State Siri Shortcuts actions.
Added Add to Siri buttons in revamped Shortcuts section.
*Enhancements*
Added Start/stop charging control.
Added active vehicle chooser to settings when multiple vehicles exists on account.
*Bugfixes*
Improved background execution. Actions should now properly complete or fail in background, and not run when app is activated after being dormant for multiple hours.

Open, Close and Unlock chargeport now all check for current state before executing, thus preventing errors if run multiple times. Do note that Open Charge Port no longer UNLOCKS charge port if already open - use specifically Unlock Charge Port for that scenario.
Fixed being able to set v3 refresh token as manual token.
Fixed a scheduling issue that could cause multiple polling threads to run simultaneously.
*New features*
Added Send Navigation Destination Shortcuts action.
Added split view on iPads and plus/max iPhones in landscape.
Added new Siri Shortcuts: Remote Start, Honk, Flash, Vent Sunroof, Close Sunroof, Enable Steering Wheel Heater, Disable Steering Wheel Heater
Added inside and outside temp complications
Added open features and plugin reminders to iOS version, along with improved background refresh support for iOS

A HUGE shoutout and THANK YOU to all my translators! You guys ROCK! - and as always, if you want the app translated to your language, get in touch! All localizations are public in the support github repository.

When iOS updates in background or when vehicle commands are executed on iOS, watchOS will try to update complications to reflect that state. Obvious use case - unlock vehicle with app on phone, and watch face should quickly reflect unlocked state on cmoplications.
Phone and Watch will now more reliably share vehicle data. So if one device gets new data, if possible, that data will be quickly reflected on the other device.
*Enhancements*
Added accessibility labels to main control buttons.

Siri action Wake now has a timeout of only 5 seconds, as 3rd party shortcuts actions can only execute for 10 seconds on iOS 14. To ensure reliability of shortcuts, put the Wake action in a loop for at least 4 times before any other actions.
Button views housekeeping - a few actions that were only labels on iOS, are now rendered as buttons.
Experimental alternate state complication for graphic rectangular
Some graphic complications now show alternate background if feature is active
Improved image caching.
On iOS, widgets will now request location access. This is in order to support plugin reminders and open features reminders.
Added configurable max wait time to wake Siri Shortcut command
Improved VIN decoder - should now be able to identify most dual motor, tri motor, performance and plaid models.
Service mode now treated like no network connection
Driving state view in full screen landscape now hides navigation bar
Driving state view in full screen now dims when data is older than 1 second, indicating streaming is not receiving data
Introduced machine translation for missing localization keys. Please report poor translations as bugs!
Vehicles in service mode will now be treated as online. Please send feedback if this introduces crashes!
Removed transfer login button - this process should be entirely automatic.
*Bugfixes*
No longer throw fatalError when retries reaches max - should fix some crashes at launch.
Fixed issue with large rectangular complication showing red app icon instead
WatchOS background updates will now wait max 12 seconds to wake car, as limited by watchOS
Fixed a bug where a login on iPhone with only an accesstoken could not be transferred to the watch
*New features*
Added Compass complication
Added Compass action for widgets
Added Set Temperature Siri Shortcut action
*Enhancements*
Updated Korean translations
Added optional updated ago timer to the graphic corner complication
Adjusted the login and settings screens
Added internal/external temp combo complication
Added vent windows for Model S including warning that it will not be possible to close remotely.
Added irreversible complication and widget command override
Added emissions-testing easter egg
Added honk, flash, frunk and trunk actions to the compass view

A HUGE shoutout and THANK YOU to all my translators! You guys ROCK! - and as always, if you want the app translated to your language, get in touch! All localizations are public in the support github repository.
*New features*
Added data age indicator to more complications. This can be turned off in settings.

Implemented new wait for wake feature in most Siri Shortcuts actions. One caveat - Due to a bug in Siri, when a timeout occurs and Siri prompts users to keep waiting, this prompt will not be localized, but Siri will prompt for the code variable name value - in all localizations but English.

Support for all 2021+ refresh vehicle images. Please send feedback if your 2021+ refresh model does not show correct background image. Please include screenshot of Settings, Show Debug, Vehicle section.
Added open features reminder exclusion locations.

Added HUD feature for iOS / iPadOS full-screen driving state view. Long press when in full screen driving state to mirror screen, darken background and set brightness to full, allowing for reflection to be used as HUD. Works best at night.
Battery view refactored and now shows warning symbols known from watch complications.

Added advanced settings section containing toggle to calculate charger power without a neutral connection and a toggle to switch range display to estimated range instead of in-vehicle configured range display (ideal or rated).
*Enhancements*
Added a plugged-in indicator to battery views and most complications. Will show a plug-emoji when car is plugged in but not charging.
Added Is Driving property to get vehicle state Siri Shortcuts action.
Background updates now postponed when receiving updated data from companion device. Should reduce non-needed wake calls and allow watch and phone to sync up if set to same background update schedule.
Streaming should now automatically restart if no date received in 4 seconds.
Vehicle shift state indicated on complications if not in P.
Complications and universal battery view will now also show if battery is cold, indicating range is reduced due to less of battery pack is accessible.
Improved logging when no vehicles on account.
Improved background image handling and caching. If background image is not set correctly, please try to clear cache from Debug menu in Settings.
Updated graphic recangular state complication to new look and feel.
Updated watch to phone messaging - when watch gets new data in background, updating phone should be more reliable.
Further improved sending data from watch to phone - now also major data actions trigger an immediate phone update.
Updated Dutch localizations.
Updated German localizations.
Removed referral link from settings screen.
Removed some modular large complications that were useless
*Bugfixes*
Changed how last data is calculated and stored - now comes directly from Tesla API.
Multiple performance optimizations when streaming data. Should be much less resource intensive now.
Fixed widgets not updating on iOS 15
Properly clearing widget background images on update.
Improved thread safety on singleton properties - should reduce background crashers. Might still be more though.
Fixed compass orientation when in landscape view.
Fixed watchOS 8 using large title on login screen.
Fixed Model S vent windows icon pointing wrong direction.

A HUGE shoutout and THANK YOU to all my translators! You guys ROCK! - and as always, if you want the app translated to your language, get in touch! All localizations are public in the support GitHub repository.
*New features*
Now only using v3 token, as Tesla will soon move to deprecate old v2 tokens entirely. This also affects advanced token login, which now only supports v3 refresh tokens.
Sharing data between watch and phone now respects selected vehicle - so you can have different vehicle selected on watch and phone - they no longer automatically sync up.
*Enhancements*
Updated VIN decoder to better identify Model X refresh models.
Show no vehicles on account after logging in, if no vehicles are attached to logged in account.
Added v2 compositor data, splitting out legacy, refresh and refresh performance for finer granularity in generating vehicle images.
*Bugfixes*
Clear vehicle data and reload vehicles when vehicle id returns 404 not found. Should fix constantly showing no network connection in this edge case.

A HUGE shoutout and THANK YOU to all my translators! You guys ROCK! - and as always, if you want the app translated to your language, get in touch! All localizations are public in the support github repository.
Initial 1.2.2 build
Added polish localizations.

A HUGE shoutout and THANK YOU to all my translators! You guys ROCK! - and as always, if you want the app translated to your language, get in touch! All localizations are public in the support github repository.
Seeing this is an error
